Constructor Detail

Sidechain

public Sidechain(chemaxon.struc.Molecule mol)
          throws chemaxon.formats.MolFormatException,
                 chemaxon.marvin.io.MolExportException,
                 chemaxon.sss.search.SearchException
When initialized from a molecule, sidechains are removed and junction pseudo atoms remain at each junction bond.

Throws:
chemaxon.formats.MolFormatException
chemaxon.marvin.io.MolExportException
chemaxon.sss.search.SearchException

public java.lang.String getCansmi()
Get canonical SMILES for this sidechain (as used for equality comparison).

getSmi

public java.lang.String getSmi()
Get SMILES for this sidechain.

getJsmi

public java.lang.String getJsmi()
                         throws chemaxon.marvin.io.MolExportException
Get SMILES for this sidechain with junction atoms as pseudo-atoms. Note this is in ChemAxon cxsmiles format e.g. "*CCC |$p_J;;;|".

Throws:
chemaxon.marvin.io.MolExportException
